meanings.definition: To interact with others in a social setting.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys socializing with her friends at school.
meanings.sent2: People often socialize at parties to have fun.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to be socializing with the other pets in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: In the bustling city, the streets were socializing with people rushing to their destinations.
meanings.sent5: The park was socializing with laughter and chatter on a sunny afternoon.

meanings.definition: The act of spending time with others in a social manner.
meanings.sent1: His favorite part of the day is the socializing during lunch break.
meanings.sent2: Socializing can help improve communication skills.
meanings.sent3: The socializing at the family reunion was filled with laughter and joy.
meanings.sent4: The classroom was a hub of socializing among students during break time.
meanings.sent5: The cafe was filled with the pleasant hum of socializing customers.
